items.name: Agent-entered notes
items.description: Log the notes manually entered by yourself

items.name: Call session id
items.description: Log RingCentral call session id

items.name: Call subject
items.description: Log a short phrase to summarize call, e.g. 'Inbound call from...'

items.name: Contact's phone number
items.description: Log the contact information of the other participant

items.name: Date and time
items.description: Log the call's explicit start and end date/times

items.name: Call duration
items.description: Log the call duration, noted in minutes and seconds

items.name: Call result
items.description: Log the result of the call, e.g. Call connected

items.name: Link to the recording
items.description: Provide a link to the call's recording, if it exists

items.name: Smart summary
items.description: Log the AI-generated summary of the call, if it exists

items.name: Call transcript
items.description: Log the AI-generated transcript of the call, if it exists

items.description: The name of the extra phone field to search for contacts in Insightly. Separate multiple fields with comma.

additionalFields.title: Help
additionalFields.description: To enable server-side logging, enter the **Bullhorn API username and password** for the account used to log calls. [Learn more](https://ringcentral.github.io/rc-unified-crm-extension/crm/bullhorn/#bullhorn-and-server-side-call-logging).
